text: John Joseph McCarthy (April 25, 1934 â€“ May 9, 2020) was an American basketball player and coach. He was born in Buffalo, New York. He played for the National Basketball Association from 1956 to 1964. He played for the Cincinnati Royals, St. Louis Hawks and the Boston Celtics. He coached the Buffalo Braves from 1971 to 1972. McCarthy died on May 9, 2020 in Buffalo at the age of 86.Former Celtics, Canisius guard John McCarthy dies at 86 ==References== ==Other websites== * BasketballReference.com: Johnny McCarthy (as player) * BasketballReference.com: Johnny McCarthy (as coach) Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Sportspeople from Buffalo, New York
title: Johnny McCarthy
